# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2024-11-27

### Added
- Initial release of the official Watchmode API TypeScript/JavaScript SDK
- Full TypeScript support with exported types
- Grouped API methods for better developer experience:
  - `title` - Get title details, streaming sources, seasons, episodes, cast/crew
  - `search` - Search by name, IMDB ID, TMDB ID
  - `person` - Get person/actor details
  - `sources` - List streaming services
  - `releases` - Get recent and upcoming releases
  - `changes` - Track new titles and source changes (paid plans)
  - `account` - Check API quota status
  - `reference` - Get regions, networks, and genres
- Support for both CommonJS and ES Modules
- Works in Node.js 18+ and modern browsers
